tweet: ..I know these are just things that happen (NetFlix didn't do anything wrong), but dammit.. what shit luck this time around. :(

In 2009 one only needs some cheap hosting, a code IDE, and an idea.. It can happen. Can't hurt to try.. I hope something comes of it.. Woo?
